resources.string:
McDollibee is a food ordering app built using the Java programming language and developed in Android Studio.
 The app allows users to easily browse and order from a variety of menu items.
 It also features an admin area where admin staff can manage and update menu items, process orders, and track customer and staff information.
 More information and update from this link.

Developer: Keth Dominic Tacatani Instructor: Gardson Binasbas College: Bohol Island State University Calape Campus
Email: kethtacatani@gmail.com
